events.message: I recently ordered a jacket but realized I want to return it because it doesn't fit well. Please guide me on how to get a refund.
The issue has been identified as a refund request due to the customer wanting to return the jacket for a refund.
Assigning the case to the refund processing team to handle the customer's request efficiently.
Hello! Thanks for contacting us. I understand you want to return the jacket and get a refund. Let's get that sorted.
Could you please provide the order number and confirm if the item is unused and in the original packaging?
Sure, the order number is 789654123. The jacket is brand new and still folded in the original packaging.
Thank you for the details. You can ship the jacket back within 14 days for a full refund. We'll provide a prepaid return label shortly.
That's great to hear, thanks! I appreciate the help and look forward to receiving the return label.
The return label has been emailed to you. Once we receive the jacket, we will issue your refund promptly.
We are following up to confirm you have returned the jacket and to check if you have any further questions or issues.
I shipped the jacket yesterday and Iâ€™m happy with the whole process. Thanks for your excellent support!
Closing this case as the customer has confirmed shipment of the return and expressed satisfaction with the support received.
A customer satisfaction survey has been sent to gather feedback about the recent refund and return experience.
